entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Taloyoak
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:34 PM MST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Crystals, -36.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Taloyoak Airport 11:00 PM MST Monday 16 January 2023
Condition: Ice Crystals
Temperature: -36.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.9 kPa steady
Visibility: 9.7 km
Humidity: 69 %
Wind Chill: -49
Dewpoint: -39.8°C
Wind: N 16 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Temperature steady near minus 39.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northeast 20 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 39. Wind chill near minus 56. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Partly cloudy. High minus 32.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness late in the afternoon. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light late in the morning. High minus 32. Wind chill minus 53 in the morning and minus 45 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature rising to minus 26 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 26 by morning. Wind chill minus 45 in the evening and minus 36 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 25. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. High minus 25. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Monday 16 January 2023
